title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Anthony: You know- I am just going to ask the question and hoping someone can provide some clarification. When I was younger- the environmentalists told me- don’t ever use paper bags, paper straws, use an iPad and no paper because we were cutting down trees. Use plastic they said- and then you can recycle. Now everyone is using paper in the supermarket for bags, they are using paper straws etc. I am being told use paper- don’t use plastic- it is bad for the environment. So which is it? And although I do want to do good by the environment- you can see why there is frustration and confusion and ultimately where some people begin to question the validity of what environmentalists put out there. Again I want to help- but make sure the information is accurate
